about me

2+

years of experience

I am a skilled and experienced full stack developer with a strong background in modern web development technologies. Over the past two years, I have honed my skills in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Redux, Python, Django, React, and Next.js.

I am proficient in building dynamic and interactive web applications using JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. I have utilized Redux, a powerful state management library, to handle complex application states in React projects. Additionally, my expertise extends to Python and Django, enabling me to develop robust and scalable back-end solutions.

With a solid foundation in front-end and back-end development, I possess the ability to create end-to-end solutions for various projects. My experience with React and Next.js has enabled me to build performant and responsive web applications.

I am excited to continue expanding my skillset and contribute to innovative projects, leveraging my expertise in full stack development to create engaging user experiences.

What I can Do

Fontend development

I specialize in creating responsive and visually appealing user interfaces. I have a strong focus on implementing APIs and integrating them seamlessly into web applications. My duties include translating design mockups into code, optimizing performance, and ensuring cross-browser compatibility. I am dedicated to delivering an exceptional user experience through intuitive and user-friendly interfaces.

Backend development

I thrive in backend development, building robust and scalable server-side solutions. With expertise in Python and frameworks like Django, I create efficient APIs and handle complex business logic. My responsibilities include database management, security implementation, and performance optimization. I am committed to delivering reliable and high-performing backend systems that power seamless user experiences.
